# zentral_gws_group_tag_mapping (Resource)

The resource `zentral_gws_group_tag_mapping` manages Google Workspace group tag mappings.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `connection_id` (String) `ID` of the Google Workspace connection for this group tag mapping (UUID).
- `group_email` (String) Group email of the Google Workspace group for this group tag mapping.
- `tag_ids` (Set of Number) `ID`s of the tags mapped with this group tag mapping.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) `ID` of the group tag mapping (UUID).
